API docs by Redocly

Marie-AI API (1.0.0)

Download OpenAPI specification:Download

Authentication

Marie-AI offers two forms of authentication:

  • API Key

jobs

List all jobs

query Parameters
limit
integer <int32> <= 100

How many items to return at one time (max 100)

Responses

Default server

https://marieai.co/v2/jobs

Sandbox server

https://marieai.co/sandbox/jobs

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
[
  • {
    • "id": 0,
    • "name": "string",
    • "tag": "string"
    }
]

Create a job

Responses

Default server

https://marieai.co/v2/jobs

Sandbox server

https://marieai.co/sandbox/jobs

Response samples

  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "code": 0,
  • "message": "string"
}

Info for a specific job

path Parameters
jobId
required
string

The id of the job to retrieve

Responses

Default server

https://marieai.co/v2/jobs/{jobId}

Sandbox server

https://marieai.co/sandbox/jobs/{jobId}

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": 0,
  • "name": "string",
  • "tag": "string"
}
